mapper.select: SELECT id, module, app_code, api_code, api_method, api_uri, api_name, write_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, version FROM iam_api WHERE deleted = 0 AND module = #{module} AND app_code = #{appCode} AND api_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{apiCode}, '%') AND api_uri LIKE CONCAT('%', #{apiUri}, '%') AND api_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{apiName}, '%') AND api_method = #{apiMethod} AND write_flag = #{writeFlag} ORDER BY id ASC
